{"step_by_step_thinking": "Working memory is the ability to hold and manipulate information in the mind over short periods of time. It is known to decline with age. Strategy training, such as memory-enhancing techniques, can help improve working memory in older adults. However, the effectiveness of such training can vary from person to person, depending on factors like the individual's cognitive abilities, the type of training, and the consistency of practice.", "answer_choice": "C. maybe"}
